scripts.cy:parallel: npm run cleanup && cypress-parallel --script cy:run --threads 5 --specsDir cypress/integration
scripts.test:api: npm run cleanup && npx cypress run --env variable=value1 --spec 'cypress/integration/api/**/*'
scripts.test:ui: npm run cleanup && npx cypress run --env variable=value2 --spec 'cypress/integration/ui/*'
scripts.cleanup: rm -R -f cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/screenshots && rm -f cypress/parallel-weights.json && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports && mkdir cypress/screenshots
scripts.report: npm run report:copyScreenshots && npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
